Name: IScream
About the game: IScream is an arcady driving game where you play as an ice cream truck driver who gets recruited by the Clowntown gang. Complete missions for the clown gang to defeat the other gangs, while the kids in the streets try to stop you by any means. Dodge kids, bullets, rockets, sound systems and many more while you run over enemy gang members, battle their vans and ride your gang to the top! Join Mr. Mumbles and the rest of the clown crew on their journey of becoming the biggest ice cream gang in the world. The world itself is mostly procedural generated on the go, except for a few story based spots and world limitations. Music composed by Fre Nuyts.
